cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
The Toyota Camry has been a fan favorite of families for years. Known for its reliability, this baby will get you to and from where you want to go.
Honda Odysseys are wonderful vans for families. They're spacious and this one even has a DVD player in the back for the kids.
The Porsche 944 is every guys dream car. Come in for a test drive. This low mileage vehicle will leave you breathless and wanting to take it home.
Want a fast car? Come in and take this Acura NSX out for a test spin. This car drives like a dream. It's everything a sports car should be and then some. Perfect for mid-life crisis.
This one of a kind Ferrari 308 is fast and purrs like a kitten. Want a car to show off to your friends, this is it. Come down and drive off in this gorgeous piece of machinery.
